newsitem.title: USA: Navarre arranges $45 mln credit facility.
newsitem.headline: Navarre arranges $45 mln credit facility.

text.p: Navarre Corp said Wednesday it has arranged a three-year, $45 million revolving credit facility with Congress Financial Corp.
The credit facility replaces a $35 million credit arrangement with another lender, Navarre said.
The new facility gives Navarre access to a larger credit line with more favorable conditions, the company said.

"This new credit facility will support our objectives by providing improved financial resources to sustain our growing business and enable us to capitalize on the opportunities that we see," said Eric Paulson, Navarre's chairman and chief executive.
Congress Financial is a unit of CoreStates Financial Corp . Navarre publishes and distributes music, software and interactive CD-ROM products.
